Specimen Type: Whole blood, buccal swab, dried blood spot
Purpose: To detect specific variants in the GALT gene for the diagnosis and characterization of galactosemia.
Container: EDTA (lavender top) tube, ACD (yellow top) tube, sterile DNA-free buccal swab, specialized filter paper
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, real-time PCR instrument, nanodrop spectrophotometer
